segments.text: The sunlight beams through the window, illuminating the kitchen in a warm glow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I feel unsettled seeing the boy's feet wobbling on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Thereâ€™s something captivating about the chaos of this moment, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: While the woman polishes her plate, completely oblivious, I can almost hear the laughter of the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that sweet sound is offset by the squishy puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think of the wood beneath the water, how it might warp and swell over time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mix of innocence and recklessness creates a complicated feeling in me.
segments.speaker: PAR
